sentences.sContent: "G’wan, midget, get out of here before I catch your cold!" the gatekeeper growled.
sentences.sContent_eng: "G’wan, midget, get out of here before I catch your cold!" the gatekeeper growled.
sentences.sCn: “赶紧出去，你这个侏儒，别让我染上你的感冒！”门卫低声咆哮着。

sentences.sContent: Napoleon, who was always considered to be kind of a dwarf, a midget, really wasn't at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: Napoleon, who was always considered to be kind of a dwarf, a midget, really wasn't at all.
sentences.sCn: 拿破仑被人们公认为是个矮子,夸张点叫侏儒 实际上并非如此

trans.tranOther: a very offensive word for someone who is very short because their body has not grown normally. Do not use this word.
